## Source: kam193 (242b446cd6cce908f668bfc1b199aa8f54a9ee1138b399ea6012f3b2bd2624e8)
Package does not contain malicious code, but was published as a part of the malicious campaign and is used during further infection stages


---

Category: MALICIOUS - The campaign has clearly malicious intent, like infostealers.

Reasons (based on the campaign):

 - Downloads and executes a remote malicious script.
